Interface View

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ViewUpdaterObserver
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    GUIInterface
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractView, CommandLineInterface, GUIController

    public interface View
extends ViewUpdaterObserver

    • Method Summary

      method that updates the view after the draft pool changed
      void updateEndGame(java.util.List<RankingPlayer> rankingPlayers, java.util.List<java.lang.String> disconnectedPlayerId)
      method that updates the view after the game ended this method has (as parameters) a list of players ordered by their points, following the game's rules and it has a list of player ids pertaining to the players that are disconnected.

      • updatePlayer

        void updatePlayer(java.lang.String playerId,
                  int favorTokens,
                  boolean connected)
        method that updates the view after a player changed any of his parameters.
        Parameters:
        playerId - the player id of the player that changed
        favorTokens - the updated number of favor tokens
        connected - the boolean variable that says whether a player is connected or not

      • updateEndGame

        void updateEndGame(java.util.List<RankingPlayer> rankingPlayers,
                   java.util.List<java.lang.String> disconnectedPlayerId)
        method that updates the view after the game ended this method has (as parameters) a list of players ordered by their points, following the game's rules and it has a list of player ids pertaining to the players that are disconnected.
        Parameters:
        rankingPlayers - a list of players ordered
        disconnectedPlayerId - a list of player ids of the players that are disconnected
